content: First of all congrats! Second, isn’t it unnerving? I’m 26 and for me it was when I turned 20 or so and realized I could clearly remember things that happened a decade ago. Since that realization the time has been FLYING. When I think about my future plans I now have to consider that from an experiential perspective I essentially will wake up tomorrow and be thirty, and then the next day 40, and so on… It’s a constant reminder to make the most of every day.
